news_header: Two men were arrested after €5m worth of cocaine was seized in County Kildare. Gardaí discovered approximately 72kg of cocaine during a search of a vehicle and a property.
news_original_title: €5m worth of cocaine seized in Kildare
news_text: The men, aged in their 50s and 60s, are charged with facilitating drug distribution for an organized crime group and will appear in court. Assistant Commissioner Angela Willis stated this is a significant seizure aimed at combating drug-related organized crime.
